dc:title: On Pilgrimage - February 1961
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Continues her car journey with observations about the geography of New Orleans. Tells of a miracle attributed to Martin de Porres and speaks of an interest in folk medicine. Admires efforts of families living on the land and their efforts at community.
